attributes.action: reunite mark and edward father and son
attributes.additional_details: I as a member of the public set up this petition to reunite a father and son who is 2 wks on the street of london,we as the public need the 10 years of heartache 3 years with out his son in his arms,and mr cameron to listen to this father's story what other father would fight to the end to get someone to listen to his story,we have over 32.0000 people from allover the world supporting this father from the hearts of many going out there way to help,we need the petition to be heard,im stuck for words in what to say about this loving caring father who will die for his son,this father needs to be noticed and his story heard,so come on lets get together and sign this petition and reunite mark and edward father and son,that is also the name ofthe group on facebook many thanks for reading !!!!!
